question:
Characterize each of the following atoms as being either nucleophilic or electrophilic.
(a) Iodide ion, $I^- $
(b) Hydrogen ion, $H^+$
(c) Carbon in methyl cation, $^+CH_3$
(d) Sulfur in hydrogen sulfide, $H_2S$
(e) Aluminum in aluminum trichloride, $AlCl_3$
(f) Magnesium in magnesium oxide, $MgO$
